headline.main: FROM NEWPORT.; The Anniversary Visit of the New-York Light Guard Their Reception and Meeting with the Boston Tigers. Correspondence of the New-york Times. BREAKFAST, PRESENTATION THE GRAND REVIEW

docs.lead_paragraph: The sun has closed upon a glorious day in the history of the New York Light Guard, and I hasten to chronicle some of the events which have made the occasion of their visit a source of the most delightful recollections, and which was characterized by the happiest success. Prompted by the generous friendship ...

docs.snippet: THE SECRETARY OF WAR MAKES A DENIAL.  A communication was received to-day by the Senate from the Secretary of War, denying that he had ever given orders to any officers directing them to give preference to particular individuals, in the cases alluded...

headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; FROM WASHINGTON. The House Amendment to the Post-Office Deficiency Bill Insisted Upon. The Post-route Bill, and the Overland Mail Amendment. SENATE. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE SECRETARY OF WAR MAKES A DENIAL. A communication was received to-day by the Senate from the Secretary of War, denying that he had ever given orders to any officers directing them to give preference to particular individuals, in the cases alluded to in the Senate's resolution, or in any other cases whatever. The Secretary gives a full history of the marble and other contracts.

headline.main: CITY INTELLIGENCE.; Central Park Investigation. MR. HOGG AND MR. BLATCHFORD ON THE STAND--MR. HOGG REITERATES HIS CHARGES, AND SAYS HE CAN PROVE THEM--HE STATES HOW HE CAME TO RESIGN, AND CHARGES MR. BLATCHFORD WITH AN ATTEMPT AT BRIBERY--MR. BLATCHFORD DENIES THE CHARGE.

docs.snippet: To the Editor of the New-York Times:  Does anybody doubt the efficacy of sanitary improvements, in preserving health, life and morals? Such doubts can only arise from the want of a knowledge of well established facts.

headline.main: SANITARY REFORM.; Statistical Facts and Other considerations Showing the Necessity of Measures of Sanitary Reform.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: Does anybody doubt the efficacy of sanitary improvements, in preserving health, life and morals? Such doubts can only arise from the want of a knowledge of well established facts.

docs.snippet: The examination in the case of the slave brig Falmouth in the United States Commissioner's Court was resumed yesterday before Commissioner BRIDGHAM, the captian Leinas, his mates and six of the craw being present.

headline.main: LAW REPORTS; THE SLAVE TRADE. Case of the Brig Falmouth What is a Felony? Authors and Actors. Banking Loans. The Higgins Case Again. Verdict for the Sewing Girl $2,000 Damages. Decisions.

docs.lead_paragraph: The examination in the case of the slave brig Falmouth in the United States Commissioner's Court was resumed yesterday before Commissioner BRIDGHAM, the captian Leinas, his mates and six of the craw being present.

headline.main: GARIBALDI.; THE INSURRECTION IN SICILY. Detailed History of Garibaldi's Expedition The Capture of Palermo The Conclusion of the Armistice.AN INTERESTING NARRATIVE.FROM THE CORRESPONDENT OF THE LONDON TIMES.

docs.snippet: It is stated that immediately after the formal annexation of Savoy and Nice, France will address a note to the European Powers notifying the fact, and demanding a reply as a recognition of the annexation by Europe.
docs.lead_paragraph: It is stated that immediately after the formal annexation of Savoy and Nice, France will address a note to the European Powers notifying the fact, and demanding a reply as a recognition of the annexation by Europe.
